quote: He's around the twist,' said Azalea. 'Breaking all the windows? He's mad.' to break all the windows in the house and drown yourself in a bucket but don't actually do it, well, that's love.
quote_letters: HES AROUND THE TWIST SAID AZALEA BREAKING ALL THE WINDOWS HES MAD TO BREAK ALL THE WINDOWS IN THE HOUSE AND DROWN YOURSELF IN A BUCKET BUT DONT ACTUALLY DO IT WELL THATS LOVE
